comment.body:
> [mod](#comment_2_1GCsW9TFfjDsvcdmKPADq1n8Q3ha72UtDQ): When I try to clone, it says "This function is disabled on this proxy"

You probably can't do it on a proxy - you should down load zeronet for your own machine. Check zeronet.io.

Like bdodroid, I'm getting this error:
Internal error: TypeError: 'bool' object has no attribute 'getitem'
UiWebsocket.py line 98 > UiWebsocket.py line 174 > UiWebsocket.py line 311 > UiWebsocket.py line 277

Except, I did sign my site! Any idea what I'm doing wrong?

> [nofish](#comment_67_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): You have to sign data/users/content.json

I already did before moving on to that step. Tried it again now - no difference.

> [insomniacity](#comment_3_19ALEdg4xnbXKKFacC93cKWUjiQRsjECoj): I already did before moving on to that step. Tried it again now - no difference.

Signed it for a third time, bounced the server, it's working now.
